Class Walker

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Collision
          Enemy
              Walker

public class Walker
extends Enemy

A walking type enemy. Walks for 50 to 200 acts in a random direction. Then waits for 50 to 200 acts until next move sequence.

Version:
Jan 19
Author:
Jerry Xu
